name: Minimum fu
description: A hand with all sequences and a valueless pair, no points for pair or waits.

name: All Simples
description: A hand made entirely of simple tiles (2-8) with no honors.

name: Ready hand
description: Declaring ready by placing a bet when one tile away from winning.

name: Three-color straight
description: A hand with the same sequence in all three suits.

name: Straight
description: A hand with a straight from 1 to 9 in one suit.

name: All Triplets
description: A hand made entirely of triplets (or quads) and a pair.

name: Three-color triplets
description: A hand with the same triplet in all three suits.

name: Seven Pairs
description: A hand made entirely of seven distinct pairs.

name: Little Three Dragons
description: A hand with two dragon triplets and a pair of the third dragon.

name: Half Flush
description: A hand made up of tiles from one suit and honors.

name: Full Flush
description: A hand made up entirely of tiles from one suit.

name: Thirteen Orphans
description: A hand with one of each terminal and honor, plus one duplicate of any of them.

name: Big Three Dragons
description: A hand with three dragon triplets.

name: Little Four Winds
description: A hand with three wind triplets and a pair of the fourth wind.

name: Big Four Winds
description: A hand with four wind triplets.

name: All Honors
description: A hand made up entirely of honor tiles.

name: All Terminals
description: A hand made up entirely of terminal tiles (1s and 9s).
